title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring Palo Alto Battlefield to your students. Review our ever-growing lesson plans and curricula. All Curriculum Materials       Historical Characters Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to Palo Alto Battlefield for a unique learning opportunity and experience the battlefield firsthand. All Field Trips       Cannoneers to your posts! Learn More     Materials to Loan Learn what materials you can borrow from us for your class. All Materials to Loan     Traveling Trunks Go beyond the textbook and bring history to life in your classroom!   All Traveling Trunks       What they wore:  U.S.-Mexican War trunks Learn More     Guest Speakers Looking for and engaging educational experience for your students? How about a Ranger program right in your classroom?  All Guest Speakers       Having a blast at your school Learn More
